select ol_num, imp_uid, i_num, i_name, i_price, i_img, ol_quan, ol_state, order_day from ( select /*+ index_desc(order_list PK_ORDER_LIST) */ rownum as rnum, ol.ol_num as ol_num, o.imp_uid as imp_uid, i.i_num as i_num, i.i_name as i_name, replace(i_price, ',') as i_price, i_img, ol.ol_quan as ol_quan, ol_state, ol.m_num as m_num, to_char(o.order_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as order_day from order_list ol inner join orders o on ol.imp_uid = o.imp_uid inner join items i on ol.i_num = i.i_num where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) orderList where rnum > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount}
and m_num = #{mvo.m_num}
